oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Robust pole-zero region assignment for structured linear multivariable uncertain systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ISMAIL, O
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper presents a method of designing the state feedback matrix based upon the relationship between the open-loop and closed-loop poles and zeros of the given structured linear MIMO uncertain system. The state feedback matrix is obtained such that the poles and zeros of the closed-loop uncertain system belong to the desired poles and zeros under all admissible parameter variations. A numerical example illustrates the proposed procedure.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: PROCEEDINGS OF THE 1997 IEEE INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON CONTROL APPLICATIONS,471-474
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: 1997 IEEE International Conference on Control Applications,HARTFORD, CT,OCT 05-07, 1997
